line_1: They loiter, lounging, lank an' lazy;
line_2: Tho' deil-haet ails them, yet uneasy;

line_1: She's saft at best an' something lazy,
She's saft at best an' something lazy,
line_2: Quo' she, 'Ye ken we've been sae busy

line_1: She's saft at best an' something lazy,
line_2: ' That trouth, my head is grown right dizzie,

line_1: The bloated Jugg, supine and lazy,
line_2: Who made no Wish, but to be easy,

line_1: O'er which to step I'm much to lazy,
line_2: And too obliging to be easy.
